Class Controller

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.controller.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountRequestController, AddResourceController, AdminDashboardController, AuthenticatedUserDashboardController, AuthorsController, DiscoverController, EditResourceController, GenresController, InstrumentsController, LoginController, MeController, PendingUserDashboardController, RequestsController, ResourceFileController, ResourcesController, TrackResourcesController, TracksController, UsersController
public abstract class Controller extends Object
Abstract base controller class providing common functionality for all controllers.

Maintains a reference to a parent controller, manages a timeline timer for periodic actions, and defines constants for resource preview dimensions.

Subclasses should extend this class to inherit shared behavior and properties.
